title: Vi Bug
body:
Hey guys,

 just curious as to how we know if/when a bug has been fixed??
I am a vi main and I don't want to just go back into a game and try it. is there a quick way to find out if it has been fixed? or just go into customs every now and then and try it?

replies.body:
Yeah this is a really really annoying bug or intended change. My ranked game went to poop because i'd try to gank, then sit in mid lane bewildered. Not playing ranked without my baby being in full form.

If Xerath and Varus are also down with a bug I think something should be implemented before the next patch since 4.21 came out so so recently.
You can no longer Flash whilst charging Q, puts it on CD like you were interrupted.
Is that the bug or did Riot implement that?
what happened to my vi babe?
Yeah, it probably wont be fixed until next patch. It also affects Xerath and Varus.
